A look at presidential elections performance from 2012 to 2020 in this majority Latino city of Lawrence in the state of Massachusetts.

![](images/citylawrence.png){fig-align="center"}

<p>.The city is also the poorest in the state located in the north east bordering Salem, New Hampshire. Obama'12 received `83%` of the vote, Clinton '16 received `81%` with 1,000 more votes and Biden'20 did very poorly getting only 73% from Trump improvement with Latino voters.</p>
